# anchorFromJointTransform

**Instance Property**

The position and orientation of this joint relative to the base joint of the skeleton.

## Declaration

```swift
var anchorFromJointTransform: simd_float4x4 { get }
```

## Tracking the position of hand joints

- **parentFromJointTransform**: The transform from the joint to its parent joint’s coordinate system.
- **isTracked**: A Boolean value that indicates whether ARKit tracks a hand joint.
